## ProgressBuilderOptions.percentFormat property

Format string for the percentage display (default: ' %3.0f%%').

**Signature:**

```typescript
percentFormat?: string;
```

## Remarks

Supports printf-style formatting: `%[width].[precision]f`<!-- -->. Use `%%` to output a literal `%` character.

## Example


```typescript
' %3.0f%%'  // ' 100%'
' %5.1f%%'  // '  50.5%'
```
